input.rewritten_query: 查询本周学生出勤异常情况

output.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.student_no, student.real_name, course.course_name, attendance.status, attendance.attend_date FROM attendance JOIN student ON attendance.student_id = student.id JOIN course_class ON attendance.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN course ON course_class.course_id = course.id WHERE attendance.status != '正常' AND attendance.attend_date >= '2024-06-10' AND attendance.attend_date <= '2024-06-16' AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, base.course_name, base.status, base.attend_date FROM base ORDER BY base.student_no, base.attend_date
